name: Healthy & Delicious: Greek Orzo Salad
description: Before actually participating in one, I thought potlucks were kind of old fashioned. I always pictured 1960s-era Knights of Columbus halls, packed with Jello molds, limp crudite, and men in ornamental antler hats. Needless to say, was I off base.
recipeIngredient: 1 large cucumber, peeled, seeded, and diced
20 pitted kalamata olives, cut into quarters
1 14-ounce can artichoke hearts (give or take), cut into eighths
3 or 4 ounces reduced fat feta cheese, crumbled

recipeInstructions.text: To a large mixing bowl, add orzo, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, artichoke hearts, and parsley. Stir to combine.
Pour olive oil into orzo mixture. Juice the entire lemon into the same bowl. Add salt and grind pepper to taste. Stir gently to combine. Add feta. Stir again. Serve cold or at room temperature.
